thread.title: Behind The Scenes Gallery of the 2017 Ford Super Duty Unveil
thread.title_full: Behind The Scenes Gallery of the 2017 Ford Super Duty Unveil

title: Behind The Scenes Gallery of the 2017 Ford Super Duty Unveil
text:
Behind The Scenes Gallery of the 2017 Ford Super Duty Unveil Posted in News on September 30, 2015 Comment ( 0 ) Corey Simone News Editor Photographers: Rick Péwé 
The launch of the 2017 Ford F-Series Super Duty last week was big news for the truck market, with an all aluminum body, high strength steel frame and every luxury option you could throw on a truck, you bet we were there to get a closer look. 
While no official numbers have been released, the rumors are swirling that the 2017 Super Duty will have 1,000 lb-ft of torque and the best in-class towing capacity. With power like that you can bet the suspension, axles and transfer case will need to be beefy. We were able to peek under the truck and see the axles in person, boy are they huge! The front axle has locking hubs and the transfer case is bigger than the current generation too. 
We can’t wait to see what the official specs are on this beast of a truck and what GM and Ram will do compete. Until Ford releases the numbers enjoy our behind the scenes photos and see if you can tell what axles and transfer case are in the 2017 Ford Super Duty!
